name: dark_clouds.jpg
description: Full image of a dramatic, stormy sky filled with dark, ominous clouds.

name: broken_gears.png
description: A collection of colourful, metallic, broken and rusted gears scattered around, shot from a slightly high angle, on a white background.

name: rain_overlay.png
description: A pattern of colourful, stylistic raindrops falling diagonally, on a white background.

name: blueprint_bg.jpg
description: Full image of a detailed technical blueprint, with intricate white lines and annotations on a deep blue background.

name: phoenix_from_ashes.png
description: A majestic, colourful phoenix with fiery orange, red, and yellow feathers rising from a small pile of grey ashes, wings spread wide, on a white background.

name: glowing_particles.png
description: A cloud of colourful, glowing, out-of-focus bokeh-like particles floating upwards, on a white background.

name: bright_sky.jpg
description: Full image of a clear, bright blue sky with a few wispy white clouds and a soft, warm sun glare.

name: modern_city.png
description: A colourful, futuristic city skyline with sleek, glass skyscrapers and flying vehicles, shot from a low angle looking up, on a white background.

name: soundwaves_overlay.png
description: A series of vibrant, colourful, concentric soundwave ripples expanding outwards from a central point, on a white background.
